info.title: U.S. EPA Enforcement and Compliance History Online (ECHO)

contact.name: U.S. EPA, OECA Integration, Targeting and Access Branch

q.output.name: output
q.output.description:
Output Format Flag.  Enter one of the following keywords:
- JSON = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation (default).
- JSONP = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation with Padding.  
- XML = Data model formatted as Extensible Markup Language.

f.output.name: output
f.output.description:
Output Format Flag.  Enter one of the following keywords:
- JSON = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation (default).
- JSONP = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation with Padding.  
- XML = Data model formatted as Extensible Markup Language.

q.p_fn.name: p_fn
q.p_fn.description: Facility Name Filter. Enter one or more case-insensitive facility names to filter results.  Provide multiple values as a comma-delimited list.  See p_fntype for additional modifiers.

f.p_fn.name: p_fn
f.p_fn.description: Facility Name Filter. Enter one or more case-insensitive facility names to filter results.  Provide multiple values as a comma-delimited list.  See p_fntype for additional modifiers.

q.callback.name: callback
q.callback.description: JSONP Callback.  For use with JSONP and GEOJSONP output only.  Enter a name of the function in which to wrap the JSON response.

f.callback.name: callback
f.callback.description: JSONP Callback.  For use with JSONP and GEOJSONP output only.  Enter a name of the function in which to wrap the JSON response.

q.p_ct.name: p_ct
q.p_ct.description: Facility City Filter. Enter a single case-insensitive city name to filter results.

f.p_ct.name: p_ct
f.p_ct.description: Facility City Filter. Enter a single case-insensitive city name to filter results.

q.p_fips.name: p_fips
q.p_fips.description: FIPS Code Filter.  Enter a single 5-character Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) state + county value to restrict results.  E.g. to limit results to Kenosha County, Wisconsin, use 55059.

f.p_fips.name: p_fips
f.p_fips.description: FIPS Code Filter.  Enter a single 5-character Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) state + county value to restrict results.  E.g. to limit results to Kenosha County, Wisconsin, use 55059.

q.p_st.name: p_st
q.p_st.description: Facility State and State-Equivalent Filter.  Provide one or more USPS postal abbreviations for states and state-equivalents to filter results.  Provide multiple values as a comma-delimited list.

f.p_st.name: p_st
f.p_st.description: Facility State and State-Equivalent Filter.  Provide one or more USPS postal abbreviations for states and state-equivalents to filter results.  Provide multiple values as a comma-delimited list.

q.p_zip.name: p_zip
q.p_zip.description: 5-Digit ZIP Code Filter. Provide one or more 5-digit postal zip codes to filter results.  May contain multiple comma-separated values.

f.p_zip.name: p_zip
f.p_zip.description: 5-Digit ZIP Code Filter. Provide one or more 5-digit postal zip codes to filter results.  May contain multiple comma-separated values.

q.p_reg.name: p_reg
q.p_reg.description: EPA Region Filter. Provide a single value of 01 thru 10 to restrict results to a single EPA region.

f.p_reg.name: p_reg
f.p_reg.description: EPA Region Filter. Provide a single value of 01 thru 10 to restrict results to a single EPA region.

q.p_ncs.name: p_ncs
q.p_ncs.description: North American Industry Classification System Filter. Enter two to six digits to filter results to facilities having matching NAICS codes.  Digits less than six will match to all codes beginning with the provided values.

f.p_ncs.name: p_ncs
f.p_ncs.description: North American Industry Classification System Filter. Enter two to six digits to filter results to facilities having matching NAICS codes.  Digits less than six will match to all codes beginning with the provided values.

q.xmin.name: xmin
q.xmin.description: Minimum longitude value in decimal degrees.

f.xmin.name: xmin
f.xmin.description: Minimum longitude value in decimal degrees.

q.ymin.name: ymin
q.ymin.description: Minimum latitude value in decimal degrees.

f.ymin.name: ymin
f.ymin.description: Minimum latitude value in decimal degrees.

q.xmax.name: xmax
q.xmax.description: Maximum longitude value in decimal degrees.

f.xmax.name: xmax
f.xmax.description: Maximum longitude value in decimal degrees.

q.ymax.name: ymax
q.ymax.description: Maximum latitude value in decimal degrees.

f.ymax.name: ymax
f.ymax.description: Maximum latitude value in decimal degrees.

q.p_mact.name: p_mact
q.p_mact.description: CAA Maximum Achievable Control Technology (MACT) Subpart codes (alpha ID between 1 and 7 characters) applicable to the facility.

f.p_mact.name: p_mact
f.p_mact.description: CAA Maximum Achievable Control Technology (MACT) Subpart codes (alpha ID between 1 and 7 characters) applicable to the facility.

q.p_fea.name: p_fea
q.p_fea.description:
Formal Enforcement Actions [within / not within] specified date range indicator. The date range is determined by parameters p_fead1 and p_fead2 or by parameter p_feay.
- W = within date range
- N = not within date range

f.p_fea.name: p_fea
f.p_fea.description:
Formal Enforcement Actions [within / not within] specified date range indicator. The date range is determined by parameters p_fead1 and p_fead2 or by parameter p_feay.
- W = within date range
- N = not within date range

q.p_feay.name: p_feay
q.p_feay.description: Years (1 to 5) Range.  This value is used to create a date range for Formal Enforcement Actions (FEA). Used along with p_fea (which indicates whether to look within or outside of the date range) to find FEAs within (or not within) the number of years specified.

f.queryset.name: queryset
f.queryset.description: Query Limiter.  Enter a value to limit the number of records returned for each query. Value cannot exceed 70,000.

q.queryset.name: queryset
q.queryset.description: Query Limiter.  Enter a value to limit the number of records returned for each query. Value cannot exceed 70,000.

f.p_feay.name: p_feay
f.p_feay.description: Years (1 to 5) Range.  This value is used to create a date range for Formal Enforcement Actions (FEA). Used along with p_fea (which indicates whether to look within or outside of the date range) to find FEAs within (or not within) the number of years specified.

q.p_feaa.name: p_feaa
q.p_feaa.description:
Agency associated with Formal Enforcement Actions:
- E = EPA
- S = State
- A = All

f.responseset.name: responseset
f.responseset.description: Response Set Limiter. Enter a value to limit the number of records per page. Value cannot exceed 1,000.

q.responseset.name: responseset
q.responseset.description: Response Set Limiter. Enter a value to limit the number of records per page. Value cannot exceed 1,000.

f.p_feaa.name: p_feaa
f.p_feaa.description:
Agency associated with Formal Enforcement Actions:
- E = EPA
- S = State
- A = All

q.p_iea.name: p_iea
q.p_iea.description:
Informal Enforcement Actions [within / not within] specified date range.  The date range is determined by parameters p_iead1 and p_iead2 or by parameter p_ieay.
- W = within date range
- N = not within date range

f.p_iea.name: p_iea
f.p_iea.description:
Informal Enforcement Actions [within / not within] specified date range.  The date range is determined by parameters p_iead1 and p_iead2 or by parameter p_ieay.
- W = within date range
- N = not within date range

q.p_ieay.name: p_ieay
q.p_ieay.description: Years (1 to 5) Range.  This value is used to create a date range for Informal Enforcement Actions (IEA). Used along with p_iea (which indicates whether to look within or outside of the date range) to find IEAs within (or not within) the number of years specified.

f.p_ieay.name: p_ieay
f.p_ieay.description: Years (1 to 5) Range.  This value is used to create a date range for Informal Enforcement Actions (IEA). Used along with p_iea (which indicates whether to look within or outside of the date range) to find IEAs within (or not within) the number of years specified.

q.p_ieaa.name: p_ieaa
q.p_ieaa.description:
Agency associated with Informal Enforcement Actions. If left blank, both agencies are included.
- E = EPA
- S = State

f.p_ieaa.name: p_ieaa
f.p_ieaa.description:
Agency associated with Informal Enforcement Actions. If left blank, both agencies are included.
- E = EPA
- S = State

q.p_pd.name: p_pd
q.p_pd.description:
Population Density Limiter (per sq mile). Enter a value to limit results to facilities located in area of a given population density.
- NONE = 0 population density per square mile
- GT100 = More than 100 population density per square mile
- GT500 = More than 500 population density per square mile
- GT1000 = More than 1000 population density per square mile
- GT5000 = More than 5000 population density per square mile
- GT10000 = More than 10000 population density per square mile
- GT20000 = More than 20000 population density per square mile

f.p_pd.name: p_pd
f.p_pd.description:
Population Density Limiter (per sq mile). Enter a value to limit results to facilities located in area of a given population density.
- NONE = 0 population density per square mile
- GT100 = More than 100 population density per square mile
- GT500 = More than 500 population density per square mile
- GT1000 = More than 1000 population density per square mile
- GT5000 = More than 5000 population density per square mile
- GT10000 = More than 10000 population density per square mile
- GT20000 = More than 20000 population density per square mile

q.p_pid.name: p_pid
q.p_pid.description: Nine-digit permit IDs. May contain up to 2000 comma-separated values.

f.p_pid.name: p_pid
f.p_pid.description: Nine-digit permit IDs. May contain up to 2000 comma-separated values.

q.p_ysl.name: p_ysl
q.p_ysl.description:
Last Facility Inspection [within / not within] Specified Date Range Indicator. The date range is determined by parameters p_idt1 and p_idt2 or by parameter p_ysly.
- W = within date range
- N = not within date range

f.p_ysl.name: p_ysl
f.p_ysl.description:
Last Facility Inspection [within / not within] Specified Date Range Indicator. The date range is determined by parameters p_idt1 and p_idt2 or by parameter p_ysly.
- W = within date range
- N = not within date range

q.p_ysly.name: p_ysly
q.p_ysly.description: Number of years (1 to 5) since last facility inspection.  A value of 1 means that it has been inspected within the year.

f.p_ysly.name: p_ysly
f.p_ysly.description: Number of years (1 to 5) since last facility inspection.  A value of 1 means that it has been inspected within the year.

q.p_ysla.name: p_ysla
q.p_ysla.description:
Facility Last Inspection Code Filter.  If left blank, both agencies are included.  Enter a value to limit results:
- E = EPA
- S = State

f.p_ysla.name: p_ysla
f.p_ysla.description:
Facility Last Inspection Code Filter.  If left blank, both agencies are included.  Enter a value to limit results:
- E = EPA
- S = State

q.p_tribedist.name: p_tribedist
q.p_tribedist.description: Proximity to tribal land limiter. Enter an amount of mile between 0 and 25 to filter results.  This parameter is only evaluated if p_tribeid is populated.

f.p_tribedist.name: p_tribedist
f.p_tribedist.description: Proximity to tribal land limiter. Enter an amount of mile between 0 and 25 to filter results.  This parameter is only evaluated if p_tribeid is populated.

q.p_fntype.name: p_fntype
q.p_fntype.description:
Controls type of text search performed on facility name with parameter p_fn.
- EXACT = Find facilities having the exact provided name(s).
- BEGINS = Find facilities with names starting with the provided term(s).
- ALL = Find facilities using Oracle text search terms.
- CONTAINS =

f.p_fntype.name: p_fntype
f.p_fntype.description:
Controls type of text search performed on facility name with parameter p_fn.
- EXACT = Find facilities having the exact provided name(s).
- BEGINS = Find facilities with names starting with the provided term(s).
- ALL = Find facilities using Oracle text search terms.
- CONTAINS =

q.p_pidall.name: p_pidall
q.p_pidall.description: Controls whether search is restricted to existing system. Y means the search will match the p_pid parameter against all associated permits (AIR, RCRA, SDWIS, etc).

f.p_pidall.name: p_pidall
f.p_pidall.description: Controls whether search is restricted to existing system. Y means the search will match the p_pid parameter against all associated permits (AIR, RCRA, SDWIS, etc).

q.qid.name: qid
q.qid.description: Query ID Selector.  Enter the QueryID number from a previously run query.

f.qid.name: qid
f.qid.description: Query ID Selector.  Enter the QueryID number from a previously run query.

q.pageno.name: pageno
q.pageno.description: Indicates the number of the page to display. It is used only when the results are paginated.

f.pageno.name: pageno
f.pageno.description: Indicates the number of the page to display. It is used only when the results are paginated.

q.newsort.name: newsort
q.newsort.description: Output Sort Column.  Enter the number of the column on which the data will be sorted. If unpopulated results will sort on the first column.

f.newsort.name: newsort
f.newsort.description: Output Sort Column.  Enter the number of the column on which the data will be sorted. If unpopulated results will sort on the first column.

q.descending.name: descending
q.descending.description: Output Sort Column Descending Flag.  Enter Y to column identified in the newsort parameter descending.  Enter N to use ascending sort order. Used only when newsort parameter is populated.

f.descending.name: descending
f.descending.description: Output Sort Column Descending Flag.  Enter Y to column identified in the newsort parameter descending.  Enter N to use ascending sort order. Used only when newsort parameter is populated.

q.p_nsps.name: p_nsps
q.p_nsps.description: Air Programl New Source Performance Standards (NSPS)  Subpart Code Search.  One or more valid Air Program NSPS Program codes cand be passed.

f.p_nsps.name: p_nsps
f.p_nsps.description: Air Programl New Source Performance Standards (NSPS)  Subpart Code Search.  One or more valid Air Program NSPS Program codes cand be passed.

q.p_year.name: p_year
q.p_year.description: The calendar year for the annual pollutant loadings.

f.p_year.name: p_year
f.p_year.description: The calendar year for the annual pollutant loadings.

q.p_nspsm.name: p_nspsm
q.p_nspsm.description: Air Programl New Source Performance Standards Minors (NSPSM) Subpart Code Search.  One or more valid Air Program NSPSM Subpart codes can be passed.

f.p_nspsm.name: p_nspsm
f.p_nspsm.description: Air Programl New Source Performance Standards Minors (NSPSM) Subpart Code Search.  One or more valid Air Program NSPSM Subpart codes can be passed.

q.qcolumns.name: qcolumns
q.qcolumns.description: Used to customize service output.  A list of comma-separated column IDs of output objects that will be returned in the service query object or download.  Use the metadata service endpoint for a complete list of Ids and definitions.

f.qcolumns.name: qcolumns
f.qcolumns.description: Used to customize service output.  A list of comma-separated column IDs of output objects that will be returned in the service query object or download.  Use the metadata service endpoint for a complete list of Ids and definitions.

q.p_ejscreen.name: p_ejscreen
q.p_ejscreen.description: Enter "Y" to limit facilities to Census block groups where one of more Environmental Justice indexes above 80th percentile.

f.p_ejscreen.name: p_ejscreen
f.p_ejscreen.description: Enter "Y" to limit facilities to Census block groups where one of more Environmental Justice indexes above 80th percentile.

ObjectId.title: Object Identifier
ObjectId.description: Sequential number assigned to each facility or cluster returned.

RegistryId.title: FRS Registry ID
RegistryId.description: 12-digit Facility Registry Service (FRS) identification number.  FRS uniquely identifies a facility by assigning an identification number (FRS ID), and uses this FRS ID to link together all EPA regulatory program database records

FacName.title: Facility Name
FacName.example: W M A T A CENTRAL MAINT FAC

FacStreet.title: Facility Street Address
FacStreet.description: Street address where facility is located, as maintained by each data system. Certain data systems also maintain mailing address information, which is not used in this report. The street address may differ across EPA databases due to differences in reported information (e.g., use of mailing address), change in ownership, use of parent or subsidiary address, etc.

FacCity.title: Facility City
FacCity.description: The city where the facility is located.

FacCounty.title: Facility County
FacCounty.description: The county where the facility is located.

FacLat.title: Latitude
FacLat.description: The latitude of the facility in decimal degrees expressed using the NAD83 horizontal datum. The coordinate comes from the FRS EPA Locational Reference Tables (LRT) file which represents the most accurate value for the facility based on the available spatial metadata.

FacLong.title: Longitude
FacLong.description: The longitude of the facility in decimal degrees expressed using the NAD83 horizontal datum. The coordinate comes from the FRS EPA Locational Reference Tables (LRT) file which represents the most accurate value for the facility based on the available spatial metadata.

PopulationDensity.title: Population Density
PopulationDensity.description: The number of persons per square mile in the area being profiled. This field is the ratio of total persons (displayed in the Total Persons field) to total land area (displayed in the Land Area field)

MaxScore.title: Max Score
MaxScore.description: A sorting score for internal use.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

QueryID.title: Query Identifier
QueryID.description: Sequential number assigned to entire search result

PageNo.title: Page Number
PageNo.description: The number of pages of results returned
